hero.description: ZINITEK provides optimized solutions for CNC machining, mold making, and industrial automation. We combine hands-on technical expertise with rigorous quality control to ensure premium quality at competitive costs.

services.hub_description: Comprehensive solutions from precision machining to factory automation, powered by Japanese engineering and cost-effective operations.
services.meta_desc: Professional CNC machining, mold design, and automation solutions with Japanese quality standards at ZINITEK.

cnc.title: Precision CNC Machining
cnc.desc: Milling, Turning, and Wire-cut EDM with tight tolerances. Consistent quality delivered via selected high-end Japanese machinery.

molds.title: Mold Design & Fabrication
molds.desc: High-precision cold stamping dies and Progressive Dies for the automotive and electronics industries.

3d_scan.title: 3D Scanning & Reverse Engineering
3d_scan.desc: Advanced Reverse Engineering using Geomagic Design X to convert physical samples into accurate CAD models.

plc.title: PLC & Industrial Automation
plc.desc: Mitsubishi and Siemens system programming. Comprehensive integration of automated production lines.

coils.title: Copper Coil Manufacturing
coils.desc: Production of high-quality Toroidal coils, transformers, and inductors for the electronics sector.

ems.title: Electronic Manufacturing Services (EMS)
ems.desc: PCB assembly, SMT/DIP services from prototyping to mass production with strict quality assurance.

it_software.title: Industrial IT & Software
it_software.desc: Mastercam, Solidworks, and Creo solutions combined with factory network infrastructure deployment.

about_summary.description: With a solid technical foundation and modern machinery, ZINITEK is proud to be a trusted partner in Vietnam's precision engineering sector.
about_summary.feature1_desc: Technical consultancy helping to reduce material costs by up to 20%.
about_summary.feature2_desc: Ultra-low tolerances, meeting the most rigorous industrial standards.
about_summary.feature3_desc: Committed deadlines supported by a streamlined control process.

featured_projects.description: A showcase of ZINITEK's machining quality and practical experience through successful projects for major partners.

news_section.description: Stay updated with the latest mechanical technology trends and machining insights from the ZINITEK team.

about_page.header_top_desc: A journey from a traditional workshop to an international standard precision machining partner.
about_page.header_desc: Originating from the Dong Thanh Phu workshop, ZINITEK has undergone a powerful transformation to become a trusted partner for Japanese, Korean, and international enterprises.
about_page.description_2: Utilizing a robust technical core and modern equipment, ZINITEK stands as a premier precision engineering partner in Vietnam.
about_page.commitment: We are committed to delivering engineering solutions with the highest precision, meeting every demanding requirement through our team of seasoned engineers.

footer.description: Your trusted partner in precision machining, mold design, and automation following Japanese quality standards.
footer.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to receive the latest technology updates and exclusive offers.
footer.address_label: My Phuoc 3 IP, Ben Cat, Binh Duong
